name: DigitalAssistantAcademy
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the digital assistant academy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Digital Assistant Academy provides a comprehensive focus on learner and industry needs. This gives it a clear advantage over voice tech course providers. Established in 2020, the Academy is the only organization with strong connections to the voice tech industry across the globe. This enables the Academy to set the standards and frameworks for privacy, ethics, inclusivity, and conversation design.

Use this skill to ask questions about what we do. Examples of things ask are:

- What will I learn?
- How much does it cost?
- Tell me about career coaching

This skill is powered by Witlingo Inc. Visit www.witlingo.com to learn more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
